remarks: If ` F ` is created by adding a single term ` ( F `` X ) = Y ` to ` G ` , where ` X ` is larger than any element of the support of ` G ` , then ` F ` is also a finitely supported function and it is assigned the value ` ( ( A ^o X ) .o Y ) +o z ` where ` z ` is the value of ` G ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2015.) (Revised by AV, 1-Jul-2019.)
